content: Just a quick poll: What IDE are we using?

/poll IDEs used when making IGs
VSCode / VS Codium / Visual Studio
Notepad++
Atom
vi/vim/nano/etc
diversity never stops surprising me.. :) You can add the option there, I think?
Now that VSCode supports CQL execution, I'll be using it. Ciao, Atom.
I'll always have a soft spot in my heart for Atom, but I have to agree. It's the way of the future, the way of the future.
